text: The 2019 Knowsley Metropolitan Borough Council election took place on 2 May 2019 to elect members of Knowsley Metropolitan Borough Council in England. This election was held on the same day as other local elections. After the election, the composition of the council was: {| class="sortable wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Party!!Seats!! ± |- |style="background-color: " | |Labour || align="center" | 37 || align="center" | -3 |- |style="background-color: " | |Green || align="center" | 3 || align="center" | +2 |- |style="background- color: " | |Liberal Democrat || align="center" | 3 || align="center" | ±0 |- |style="background-color: " | |Independent || align="center" | 2 || align="center" | +1 |- |colspan=4|Source: The Guardian |} ==Election results== ===Overall election result=== Overall result compared with 2018. thumb|Knowsley Metropolitan Borough Council composition after the 2019 election ==Ward results== ===Cherryfield=== ===Halewood North=== ===Halewood South=== ===Northwood=== ===Page Moss=== ===Prescot North=== ===Prescot South=== ===Roby=== ===Shevington=== ===St Gabriels=== ===St Michaels=== ===Stockbridge=== ===Swanside=== ===Whiston and Cronton=== ===Whitefield=== ==References== Category:2019 English local elections 2019 Category:2010s in Merseyside Category:May 2019 events in the United Kingdom
title: 2019 Knowsley Metropolitan Borough Council election
